name: League of Legends 2D
description:
Control:

  • Move: right/left mouse click
  • Abilities: Q, W, E or R (Each champion only has 1 or 2 abilities)
  • Zoom: scroll middle button of mouse
  • Hacker mode: P (on/off)
  • Play/Pause: ESC

GamePlay: 

Link:

  • Project code: Github
  • Version 2 is under development, welcome to contribute: Github
